Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) systems have the potential to reduce emissions from seagoing vessels.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: However, it is unknown whether ship motions influence the system's operation.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: In this research, a 1.5 kW SOFC module is operated on an inclination platform that emulates ship motions, to evaluate the influence of static and dynamic inclinations on the system's safety, operation, and lifetime.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: The test campaign consists of a static inclination test, a dynamic test, a degradation test, and a high acceleration test.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: There were no interruptions in the power supply during the different tests, and no detectable gas leakages or safety hazards.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: Although the SOFC does not fail in any test condition, dynamic inclinations result in forced oscillations in the fuel regulation, which propagate through the system by different feedback loops in the control architecture, leading to significant deviations in the operational parameters of the system.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: Additionally, for motion periods from 16 to 26 s, reoccurring exceedance of the fuel utilisation results in a gradual reduction of the power supply.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions

Sentencas: Several enhancements are recommended to improve the design of SOFCs and marine fuel cell regulations to ensure their safe operation on ships.
Titulo: Experimental evaluation of a solid oxide fuel cell system exposed to inclinations and accelerations by ship motions
